title: Cannot move Contacts and Mailing Lists between address books
content: I have three address books, of which the middle one contains many mailing lists. I wish to move these lists to my Personal Address Book. However, I cannot drag and drop any Contacts or Mailing Lists from the middle address book to the Personal Address Book, nor vice versa.
creator: groucho3

title: email does not auto-populate from address book
content:
Hello,

I have just installed Thunderbird onto my new computer. I imported the address book from my old computer but it doesn't auto-populate the recipient when I type their name.

Your help would be much appreciated. 

Regards

John
creator: johnw13

title: moving thunderbird to a new computer
content:
Thunderbird stopped sending and receiving emails. I installed a new copy of thunderbird on another computer. After some time I was able to get it functional there. I would now like to have the same mail folder structure on the new machine as the old and import all my old information. I have exported the contents of the old Thunderbird profile to a usb drive. There are a large number of files and folder - 167 to be exact. The path the to the profile folder on my old computer was ....AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\t3ozjfx.default. This is the 'Local directory' in the Server Settings on the old computer. The path to Profile folder on the new installation is also ...AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\ but then there are two profile type files. One called t3ozjfx.default as before and another called test.default. The 'Local directory' in the Server Settings on the new computer is .....AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\t3ozjfjx.default\ImapMail\mail.cts.com-1.au It took me a great deal of effort to get emails sending and receiving properly on the new machine. It should have been just a matter of having the correct port addresses, server name, and encription method. However one had to fiddle with the local directory path to get operational

My question is given the above should I be able to get my old email file structure and the contents of those files onto the new computer by using the import facility in thunderbird. I would also like have the 'sent' messages on the old computer on the new computer. Will the thunderbird import operation be able to do this using the profile file information I put on the usb memory.

I hope I have not been too tedious in asking this question. It would be an immense relief if I could get Thunderbird on my new computer to have all the contents and folder structure that I had on the old computer.

sincerely yours

Devin Trussell Melbourne Australia
creator: info9493

title: how to use the same msgFilterRules.dat for several mail account
content:
Hi there ! I'm trying to use the same msgFilterRules.dat for several mail account. To do that I tried to use Windows symbolic links. I copied my main msgFilterRules.dat onto a common place (GoogleDrive) and then I replaced each msgFilterRules.dat in my profiles by a symbolic link.

example : mklink msgFilterRules.dat "C:\Users\guyot\Google Drive\datajp\msgFilterRules.dat" Lien symbolique créé pour msgFilterRules.dat <<===>> C:\Users\guyot\Google Drive\datajp\msgFilterRules.dat

This was working as expected, BUT as soon as I update the msgFilterRules.dat of one of my mail account the symbolic link is replaced by a regular text file.

Is there a way to avoid to have to copy again the updated msgFilterRules.dat on GoogleDrive and to re-create the symbolic link.

Thanks for your informations and help.

Regards.

JPG
creator: guyot.jean.pierre.ma

content:

I am able to open the Message Filter dialog, but I find that the options are a little unclear.

Any help would be appreciated.

I am running v102.11.0 (64-bit)

title: Creating boolean conditions in Thunderbird filters
content:
I would like to apply a filter to incoming email that 

contains  stringTo  in the To: address field     AND also contains EITHER  stringSubject1  OR  stringSubject2  in the Subject line

Is this possible? I have not found a way other than creating two filters to be run in a row.
creator: ronks1

title: Deleting from gmail without deleting from TB
content: First. I'm using 102.12.0. All addresses/4 are IMAP. 3 are gmail. When I delete messages, either through Junk or trash or spam. They go away immediately. When I close and reopen TB, they are all back. I suspect that's because of IMAP. Right? But if I go to gmail and delete them there, they do not come back. And I lose every gmail message that I delete from them. i.e. They are deleted from gmail and also TB. Even though I had saved them on TB. How can I delete the gmail messages from gmail, but not TB? I want them gone on gmail, but saved on TB. What account settings should I be changing? What I have now on the "junk Settings" is: Enable adaptive..checked; Do not auto mark..Personal..checked; Everything else is unchecked. Is this clear?
creator: PennsyNut

title: Unblocking
content: If I can tell TB to not block a gif I copy from an external source, WHY do I have to unblock a gif copied from my disk? Thanks...
creator: RHall

title: The Microsoft 365 email account operated by 21Vianet is unavailable
content:
I keep getting an error message saying that the username and password are incorrect when logging in. I assure you that they are correct. Perhaps it is because OAuth2 does not support the following MX Server.

My email account functions properly on other email clients. It appears that you do not provide support for Microsoft 365 email accounts managed by 21Vianet in China, as their IMAP/POP3/SMTP addresses differ from those of Microsoft's own Microsoft 365. The MX servers are as follows: IMAP/POP Server: partner.outlook.cn SMTP Server: smtp.partner.outlook.cn

You can find this information on the following page: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/settings-for-pop-and-imap-access-for-microsoft-365-operated-by-21vianet-ca51235d-afc5-4d7d-843c-3616a37d5771

Please attempt to rectify the issue
creator: Cee

title: Can't send emails
content:
Returned from a 6/25 - 7/6 vacation and Thunderbird (TB) would receive but could not send emails. Error message is:

"Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <ralphgj18@bresnan.net> sender rejected. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again."

During vacation computer was turned off and unplugged from the internet and I did not do anything with TB while on vacation. I checked with Internet email service provider and there was nothing wrong from its side. I have Window 10 and TB version 102.13.0. There were no updates to my ESET Internet Security program (v16.1.14.0).

I have been through the email support strings, but found nothing that could lead me to a solution.

Please advise as to how to proceed.

Thank you, Ralph
creator: ralphgj18

title: Autoformat URL's to hyperlinks
content:

Thanks for any comment
